the quickest switch to "I'm a fucking retard" to "I'm the smartest human ever born" in gaming

A very fun game to play with friends, with an unexpectedly immersive and particularly interesting single-player story. The game is not only an extremely intricate puzzle game; it has subtle elements of horror that work extremely well with the amazing story line. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to play a game with a compelling and immersive story with a knack for puzzles. The puzzles get harder as the game goes on, but are never too hard to discourage a player. Valve really outdid themselves with this one!
I played this game 8 years after release and just wanna say that this is one of the best games I have ever played.

Portal 2 is one of those all time classics, I originally played this game on the Xbox 360 and some years later I still enjoy playing it on my computer. The game really makes you think and is a fantastic addition to the portal series. Highly recommend to anyone who has the time to play it.

Best game to play while in Quarantine, a classic game at an affordable price

This game is the peak of puzzle games. I have never encountered another game before or since that can rival just how incredible of an experience playing through this game is. The characters are all colorful and memorable, from the devious GLADoS to Cave Johnson. The story is also great with many small details hidden that really flesh out the world.

The game runs pretty well and looks decent even all these years later. Didn't encounter any major performance issues while playing.

All of the puzzles feel balanced, and none of them felt particularly unfair. Never had to resort to using a guide while playing. There was a single puzzle that didn't really sit well with me though, that was the [spoiler] puzzle in which you destroy the neurotoxin generator. The platforms upon which you place your portals to cut the tubes using lasers move, but it was previously established you cannot place portals on moving platforms. While it is a pretty creative concept and makes sense, the contradiction of previously established canon kinda ruins it. [/spoiler]

The music while in the background for most of the game is pretty good. Unpopular opinion, but the ending song in this game is even better than the first one. The turret song is also good. In general a great soundtrack!

Overall, amazing game and I cannot recommend it enough

Gerek grafikler gerekse oynanış açısından herkesin hoşuna gidecek türden bir yapım. Hikayeye kendinizi kaptırmanız ise hiç şaşılacak şey değil. Oyun sonuna geldiğinizde, oyun bitti sanıyorsanız topluluk haritalarına bakın veyahut arkadaşınızla oynamayı deneyin. Benim için 10/10 alan, keşke Valve 3'e kadar saymayı bilse dedirten oyun.

Ne oyun ama be. 2017'de aldım ve her sene bir defa baştan oynattı bana. İlgili her içeriği her easter Egg'i neredeyse her şeyi ezdim hala doymadım bu oyuna. 100 saatimi gömmüşüm şu ana kadar fazlasıyla değdi. Hikayesi ayrı muhteşem co-op'u ayrı muhteşem.

Çocuklarıma bu oyunu oynatıp yüz ifadelerini seyredeceğim zamanı heyecanla bekliyorum.
